name: Cute Critter Codex
description:
Cute Critter Codex

[v0.1]

Scan barcodes to find creatures hidden in plain sight!

This is my Global Game Jam 2018 / FGJX entry and the first thing I've ever made with Unity. 

This is an unfinished prototype - the core functionality is there, but the codex doesn't show anything meaningful yet.

Can you find all the monsters? Yes you can there are literally 10 of them

Stay tuned for a post-jam version, it's called

BARCODE BESTIARY

and it's my next project after Mic's masks!

Pixel art
@oggborbis (it me)
& very special guest artist @soft_wizard

3D art
@Art21994

Special thanks
all the friendly Unity gurus at FGJX for assistance and patience!
m5x7 font by the ever inspiring gamejam master Managore
The script that made this all possible
